title: Jack Dorsey's Planned Move to Africa
itunes:title: Jack Dorsey's Planned Move to Africa
description:
TechCrunch Contributor Jake Bright discusses Twitter and Square CEO Jack Dorsey's potential move to Africa. He says after a visit in November 2019, Dorsey's most identifiable interest relates to Bitcoin and potentially establishing a cryptocurrency exchange in Africa.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
